quotes.text: In your eyes, I have found my home. In your heart, I have found my love.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you have been together. It's about how much you love each other every single day.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: The future depends on what you do today. Make it count.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, honorable, compassionate.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
